assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nakayo, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of telecommunications equipment in Japan and internationally. The company operates through Business Solutions, Consumer Solutions, Network Solutions, and Service & Support divisions. It offers key telephone systems, telephone sets and parts, and switching and data equipment, as well as devices related to environmental, and energy equipment and related products. The Business Solutions division offers digital button telephones, IP terminal devices, cordless phones, DSL modems, components, etc. The Consumer Solutions division provides ISDN terminal adapters, alarm devices, PHS modules, cordless phones, and fax machines. The Network Solutions division offers switching systems, PBXs, and transfer equipment. The Service & Support division offers EMS and software development services; and metal dies for presses/molds, etc. The company was formerly known as Nakayo Telecommunications, Inc. and changed its name to Nakayo, Inc. in August 2014. Nakayo, Inc. was incorporated in 1944 and is based in Maebashi, Japan.
